Base Functionality¶

scinoephile.Base Base for scinoephile classes
scinoephile.CLToolBase Base for scinoephile command line tools
scinoephile.SubtitleDataset Represents a collection of subtitles
scinoephile.SubtitleSeries Represents a subtitle track
scinoephile.SubtitleEvent Represents an individual subtitle

Base Classes¶

Base¶

class scinoephile.Base(verbosity=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base for scinoephile classes

embed_kw¶

dict: use IPython.embed(**self.embed_kw) for more useful prompt

package_root¶

str: Path to package root directory

verbosity¶

int: Level of output to provide

Series¶

class scinoephile.SubtitleSeries(verbosity=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: pysubs2.ssafile.SSAFile, scinoephile.Base

Represents a subtitle track

Extension of pysubs2’s SSAFile with additional features. Includes code for loading to and saving from hdf5; while these are part of separate classes in pysubs.SSAFile, this additional separation is not needed here.

Todo

  • [ ] Print as a pandas table
  • [ ] Document
event_class¶

alias of scinoephile.SubtitleEvent.SubtitleEvent

save(path, format_=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Saves subtitles to an output file

pysubs2.SSAFile.save expects an open text file, so we open the hdf5 file here for consistency.

classmethod load(path, encoding='utf-8', verbosity=1, **kwargs)[source]¶

Loads subtitles from an input file

pysubs2.SSAFile.from_file expects an open text file, so we open the hdf5 file here for consistency

Event¶

Bases: pysubs2.ssaevent.SSAEvent, scinoephile.Base

Represents an individual subtitle

Extension of pysubs2’s SSAEvent with additional features
